title: The minimum area for each phase shall be 4000sq
clause_text: The minimum area for each phase shall be 4000sq. m. in Island City and 6000 sq. m. in Suburbs and Extended Suburbs.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The minimum area for each phase shall be 4000sq. m. in Island City and 6000 sq. m. in Suburbs and Extended Suburbs.
